Production

Item Creation Process: Crafting · Design · Fabrication · Materials · Production
Design Types: Tools · Clothing and Jewelery · Containers


Production skills are used to generate the basic commodities of trade and resources for crafting from the general environment. An essential part of the economy, they differ from crafting skills in that they generally produce a base material from the environment, or aid in locating the base material in the environment through tracking, rather than converting one portable material to another.

Production Skills;

  • Farmer
  • Fisher
  • Herbalist
  • Miner
  • Skinner
  • Tracking

Most of these skills work by finding random sites of the appropriate type, which can be manipulated with the associated skill. The frequency and type of these random spawns is determined by the area- thus a rocky area is more likely to spawn mines than a grassy area (while a farmer will find grassy areas more useful than rocky). Most locational production types have some sort of "tracking" included in the skill to make it easier to find the desired sites.

Skinner is an odd exception to the rule, in that it's "random sites" are dead creatures.
